ChangeDescriptions.ChangeDescription: Version 2.36: Renamed the 'TransferToLinkFailureLogic' process in the BasicNode process logic to 'TransferFailureLogic'. If the 'AutoTransferOnEntry' property value of the BasicNode is 'To Parent External Node' and the transfer to the specified parent external node fails, then the token now executes the 'TransferFailureLogic' process.
Version 2.37: Changed 'Capacity' display name to 'Initial Capacity' as object capacities are now user assignable.
Version 2.39: Updated the BasicNode object process logic to specify all of the object's process delays as non-interruptible.
Version 2.40: In the object process logic, the 'Action' property for all Execute steps executing an 'add-on process' is now specified as 'WaitUntilCompleted'.
Version 2.41: Minor property description and display name updates.
Version 3.42: Changes related to setting the 'Token Associated Object Destroyed Action' option for process logic in this object.
Version 3.44: 'SeizedObjects.UnitsOwned' function renamed to 'SeizedObjects.CapacityUnitsOwned'.
Version 3.47: Added new 'Appearance' property category.
Version 3.48: Hide new 'Random Number Stream' property in 'Routing Logic' category.
Version 3.49: Specified the 'OnAssociatedObjectTransferRequested' property of some processes as 'EndProcess'.

Version 3.54: Added new Notify step to 'TransferFailureLogic' process to output a warning if automatically destroying an entity. Conversion to 'OnRunInitialized' standard interface process. Added 'Run Ending' add-on process trigger.
Version 3.56: Added new 'Tally Statistics' property category.
Version 3.57: Change to new 'OnEnteredParking' standard interface process that was added to Simio's base node object.

Version 4.58: Removed 'AutoTransferOnEntry' property. The 'ExternalNodeName' property is now always visible with display name 'Bound External Output Node'. If a transfer to parent external node attempt fails, then the token now continues normal processing instead of executing the 'TransferFailureLogic'. Added new 'Advanced Options' property category.
Version 4.60: Process logic now uses new object 'SeizedResources.CapacityUnitsOwned' function instead of deprecated 'SeizedObjects.CapacityUnitsOwned'.
Version 4.61: Set all inherited properties in 'Financials' category to not be visible.
Version 4.63: Set all inherited properties in 'Financials->Resource Costs' to not be visible.
Version 4.65: Process logic now uses new object 'SeizedResources.CapacityOwnedOf' function instead of deprecated 'SeizedResources.CapacityUnitsOwned'.

Version 4.66: If bound to an external output node of the parent model, a basic node's 'Entered' event is still fired and its 'Entered' add-on process trigger still executed before transferring the entity out of the parent model.

Version 4.68: The BasicNode object is no longer enabled as a resource object, and the 'InitialCapacity', 'RankingRule', and 'RankingExpression' properties have been replaced by equivalent 'InitialTravelerCapacity', 'EntryRankingRule', and 'EntryRankingExpression' properties. Renamed 'InitializedAddOnProcess' property to 'RunInitializedAddOnProcess'. Renamed 'ExternalNodeName' property to 'BoundExternalOutputNode'.
Version 4.73: New 'Random Number Stream' property now available in the 'Advanced Options' category.

Version 4.74: If a traveler is attempting to transfer out of the node and has no network assigned (i.e., is using free space for travel), then the node's process logic now transfers the traveler into free space.
Version 4.77: Removed an unnecessary 'TransferFailureLogic' Execute step from the 'OnEnteredToAssociatedObject' process logic.
Version 5.87: Process logic now uses new property 'HasValue' function instead of deprecated 'IsDefined'.
Version 5.91: Added information to indicate which properties to display if the new 'Show Commonly Used Properties Only' option is enabled.
Version 6.103: Some property description updates.
Version 7.130: Renamed 'RandomNumberStream' property to 'BranchingRandomNumberStream'
Version 7.131: Added new 'Routing Logic -> Other Routing Out Options' property category with possible 'Branching Random Number Stream' property.
Version 8.133 'OnEntered' process logic no longer requires a Decide 'IfFreeSpaceTraveler' step. Added 'State Assignments' property category.
Version 8.134 'Routing Logic -> Other Routing Out Options -> Random Number Stream' property now inherited from the base node definition
Version 8.137 'TransferFailureLogic' now gives warning notification if automatically parking entity.
Version 8.147: Property description string updates.
Version 12.212: Renamed 'TalliesOnEnteringValue' property to 'TalliesOnEnteringValueExpression'. Renamed 'TalliesOnExitedValue' property to 'TalliesOnExitedValueExpression'.
Version 15.256: Added option to specify a path planner to conditionally use when transferring to an outbound link.

ElementProperty.Name: PathPlannerName
ElementProperty.Description:
The name of the Path Planner element used by an entity to find and reserve a network deadlock-free shortest path from this node to its destination node.
NOTE: If path planning is used by an entity then the Outbound Link Preference and Outbound Link Rule properties are ignored.

RepeatingProperty.Name: AssignmentsOnEntering
RepeatingProperty.Description: Optional state assignments when an entity is entering the object.

ListProperty.Name: AssignmentsOnEnteringAssignConditionType
ListProperty.Description: Condition required to perform the assignment.

ExpressionProperty.Name: AssignmentsOnEnteringAssignCondition
ExpressionProperty.Description: The condition required to perform the assignment.

StateProperty.Name: AssignmentsOnEnteringStateVariableName
StateProperty.Description: Name of the state variable that will be assigned a new value.

RepeatingProperty.Name: TalliesOnEntering
RepeatingProperty.Description: Optional tally statistics to record when an entity is entering the node.

ListProperty.Name: TalliesOnEnteringTallyConditionType
ListProperty.Description: Condition required to record the tally statistic.

ExpressionProperty.Name: TalliesOnEnteringTallyCondition
ExpressionProperty.Description: The condition required to record the tally statistic.

ElementProperty.Name: TalliesOnEnteringTallyStatisticName
ElementProperty.Description: The name of the tally statistic for which to record an observation value.

EnumProperty.Name: TalliesOnEnteringValueType
EnumProperty.Description:
The type of observation value to record.
If the value type is 'Expression', then the value of the specified expression is recorded.
If the value type is 'TimeBetween', then the time since the last entity arrival to this or any other Tally step referencing the tally statistic is recorded.

ExpressionProperty.Name: TalliesOnEnteringValueExpression
ExpressionProperty.Description: The expression returning the value to be recorded.

RepeatingProperty.Name: TalliesOnExited
RepeatingProperty.Description: Optional tally statistics to record when an entity has exited the node.

ListProperty.Name: TalliesOnExitedTallyConditionType
ListProperty.Description: Condition required to record the tally statistic.

ExpressionProperty.Name: TalliesOnExitedTallyCondition
ExpressionProperty.Description: The condition required to record the tally statistic.

ElementProperty.Name: TalliesOnExitedTallyStatisticName
ElementProperty.Description: The name of the tally statistic for which to record an observation value.

EnumProperty.Name: TalliesOnExitedValueType
EnumProperty.Description:
The type of observation value to record.
If the value type is 'Expression', then the value of the specified expression is recorded.
If the value type is 'TimeBetween', then the time since the last entity arrival to this or any other Tally step referencing the tally statistic is recorded.

ExpressionProperty.Name: TalliesOnExitedValueExpression
ExpressionProperty.Description: The expression returning the value to be recorded.

ElementProperty.Name: RunInitializedAddOnProcess
ElementProperty.Description: Occurs when the simulation run is initialized.

ElementProperty.Name: RunEndingAddOnProcess
ElementProperty.Description: Occurs when the simulation run is ending.

ElementProperty.Name: EnteredAddOnProcess
ElementProperty.Description: Occurs when an entity's leading edge has entered this node.

ElementProperty.Name: ExitedAddOnProcess
ElementProperty.Description: Occurs when an entity's trailing edge has exited this node.

ExternalNodeProperty.Name: BoundExternalOutputNode
ExternalNodeProperty.Description: The name of an external output node that this node has been bound to in order to transfer entities out of the containing (parent) object. The transfer attempt will be performed by an entity immediately upon entering the node and, if successful, any other crossing and routing logic for the node will be ignored.

Event.Name: Entered
Event.Description: The Entered event provides notification that an entity has entered the node.

Event.Name: Exited
Event.Description: The Exited event provides notification that an entity has exited the node.
